page.title: 14EDUCATION
page.content: Most children attend Hepworth Junior School.There are 95 pupils in 4 classes. The children come from Holmfirth, Wooldale,Jackson Bridge, Shepley,Hepworth and Hade Edge, arriving by car or on foot.The main building was built in 1884. School begins at 9.00am and finishes at 3.30pm.There is no school uniform. Every child stays for dinner. They go to Holmfirth High when they leave.Out of school activities include cricket, choir and chess.Hepworth School have bought 4 guide dogs. Children in sq.1807 attend Birdsedge First School, Scissett Middle School and Shelley High School, travelling by car and Mini Bus. The remaining pupils go to Hazlehead Junior School which is closing in 1985,they will then go to Millhouse Green Junior School then to Penistone Grammar School.
